AMD FreeSync Premium

Samsung ODYSSEY G9 LS49CG930SW 49" 240Hz OLED Curved Gaming Monitor

The Samsung ODYSSEY G9 LS49CG930SW is an outstanding 49-inch curved gaming monitor that provides gamers with an immersive and exciting visual experience. With a Dual Quad High-Definition (DQHD) resolution of 5120 x 1440 pixels, this monitor's large 49-inch OLED display produces amazingly crisp and vivid graphics. The OLED display is complimented with a high 240Hz refresh rate and an ultra-fast 0.03ms reaction time (GTG), resulting in smooth, fluid gameplay with less motion blur or tearing. The ODYSSEY G9 LS49CG930SW has a wide selection of ports to meet your gaming and multimedia requirements. It has two HDMI connections, a DisplayPort, a three-port USB hub, and a headphone out, giving you plenty of options for easily connecting various devices and accessories. This gaming display includes a number of features designed to improve your gaming experience and encourage comfortable viewing. The built-in speakers provide immersive audio without the need for additional speakers. Flicker-Free technology reduces screen flicker, while FreeSync Premium Pro maintains smooth synchronization between the monitor's refresh rate and your graphics card, preventing screen tearing and stuttering. One of the most notable aspects of the ODYSSEY G9 LS49CG930SW is its 1800R curvature, which wraps around your field of view for a more immersive gaming experience. This curvature, along with the big screen size and high-resolution display, results in a very compelling visual experience that draws you into the game. The display includes a Low Blue Light setting, which reduces eye strain by reducing blue light emissions. This feature, combined with its curved shape, makes the Samsung ODYSSEY G9 LS49CG930SW an excellent choice for gamers seeking a balance of immersive images, great performance, and eye comfort.

0.03ms Response time & 240Hz Refresh rate

Be quicker to engage, counter, and dodge than the others with the ODYSSEY G9 Monitor. With a response time of 0.03 ms, OLED technology offers nearly instantaneous response times (GtG). With a frame rate of 240Hz, DisplayPort and HDMI 2.1 connectors let you stay ahead of the competition. When it comes to facing the best, milliseconds count.

Sharper Visuals

Even if your screen is larger, don't lose detail. More pixels per inch provide the clarity required to see little but important details throughout the Odyssey G9 screen, which measures 1m 24.4cm (49").

Lose Yourself in Super Ultrawide Vistas

A super ultrawide display immerses you in vast realms. A screen as large as two quad high definition Samsung ODYSSEY G9 monitor provides ample area to soak in all the pin-sharp detail. It wraps around your field of vision with 1800R curvature, immersing you totally in your character's shoes.
